data.name: Portal Walk
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in an adventure between worlds in the incredible pixel platformer Portal Walk and help Eugene find his way home!

Search for keys, collect fragments of the portal, fight with a lot of difficult enemies and go to other worlds, moving through the levels!



Features:
● Hardcore Levels
● Unique Worlds
● Action Events
● Challenging Bosses
● Atmospheric Music
● Steam Achievements
● Support Game Controllers (Playstation DualShock, Xbox Wireless and other)

Indie Cup S'21 – Best Mobile Game
Games Gathering 2021 – Best Art
Valencia Indie Summit 2022 – Selection of Jury
Pocket Gamer 2017 – 7/10, Bronze Award
Touch Arcade 2017 – Top 3 Hot Games

data.short_description: Portal Walk is incredible pixel platformer about an adventure between worlds with action events and challenging bosses.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
data.reviews:
“A hardcore platformer with its own take on the genre”
Bronze – Pocket Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
